channel.title: Pk points! and pk shop!
channel.description: Does anybody know how to make you get points when you pk somebody? and after that how can you make a shop that uses them? Please. I really need help with this. :confused:

item.title: Pk points! and pk shop!
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

You need to add tokens… So that they read, write, and save to one’s character file. You’d also have to create a line in the save file of the characters. For a shop, you’d have to do some complicated things to connect the points to the items… Sorry if it’s not helpful; just trying to point you in the right direction.

Read full topic
